Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9500. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen in selecting high-quality solutions. Don't miss out on this opportunity to significantly boost your business efficiency and profitability. Should you have any questions or require further details, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
